title: Amongst the Stars, Out in the Ocean, There’s You - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Confident Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Dishonest Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Proactive Protagonist   Revenge   Seduction
author: Zhao Xibao   赵玺宝
description:
The only condition he asked of her before marriage was for her to be 'good'. After marriage, she truly was well-behaved. She sees his gifts but does not react, she knows about his promiscuous relationships but does not ask. She holds no hope of garnering his love and affection, and never once, did she forget to take her Plan B pills. She even complied and signed the divorce papers!

....

With a grim look on his face, he stopped the woman who was about to escape. 

She grinned sweetly, 'Young master Su, don't forget, we have gotten a divorce, we are completely uninvolved now!' 

The man shredded the divorce papers and smiled with his teeth clenched, 'Ask the bun in your stomach whether or not we are still involved!'>
